url.helpText: Provide the full URL to access the SonarQube server. e.g. http://my.server.host:port

userName.helpText: The user should have permissions to access and read all information about your project and the metrics collected.

appToken.helpText: Provide the application token generated for the user to programatically access the project.

projectName.helpText: Click the connect button to fetch projects from server. Select from the list of projects fetched.

metrics.helpText: Click the connect button to fetch the metrics available on the server. Select one or metrics that needs to be fetched.
